actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.
